content:
Picture yourself on a boat, surrounded by crystal-clear waters and basking in the warm Hawaiian sun. Suddenly, you witness a giant splash in the distance and turn to see a massive humpback whale breaching just yards away. This unforgettable moment can become a reality at the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary in Kihei. Located off the coast of Maui, this sanctuary is home to thousands of humpback whales each year who come to breed, calve, and nurse their young. With an area spanning approximately 1,165 square miles of ocean, the sanctuary was created to offer protection to these majestic creatures.

But the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary is just one of the many incredible experiences that await you and your family in Kihei. From beautiful beaches to world-renowned snorkeling and diving spots, there is no shortage of family-friendly activities in this tropical paradise. To make your trip planning easier, consider booking your stay with Family Vacation Rentals. We offer a wide selection of kid-friendly and family-friendly vacation rentals in Kihei and other family-friendly areas on Maui. So why wait? Start planning your next Maui trip with Family Vacation Rentals today, and create memories that will last a lifetime.
